Package com.mygdx.game

Class GameScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.GameScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
    public class GameScreen
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
    This is the main class of the game which runs all the logic and rendering Here all the outside objects are created and drawn as well as interactions registered

    Black Cat Studios and Team Triple 10s

    Author:
    Robin Graham, Riko Puusepp, Kelvin Chen, Amy Cross, Labib Zabeneh, Felix Seanor, Jack Vickers, Jack Hinton, Sam Toner

      • GameScreen

        public GameScreen​(MyGdxGame game,
                  com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMap map,
                  int numCustomers,
                  Difficulty difficultyLevel,
                  boolean loadSave)
        Constructor class which initialises all the variables needed to draw the sprites and also manage the logic of the render as well as setting the camera and map Mixture of BlackCatStudios and TeamTriple10
        Parameters:
        game - base Object which is used to draw on
        map - the map
        numCustomers - the num customers
        difficultyLevel - the difficulty level
        loadSave - the load save
